verses.plain: My son, hast thou sinned? do so no more, but ask pardon for thy former sins.

tokens.t: My son, hast thou sinned? do so no more, but ask pardon for thy former sins.

verses.plain: Flee from sin as from the face of a serpent: for if thou comest too near it, it will bite thee: the teeth thereof are as the teeth of a lion, slaying the souls of men.

tokens.t: Flee from sin as from the face of a serpent: for if thou comest too near it, it will bite thee: the teeth thereof are as the teeth of a lion, slaying the souls of men.

verses.plain: All iniquity is as a two edged sword, the wounds whereof cannot be healed.

tokens.t: All iniquity is as a two edged sword, the wounds whereof cannot be healed.

verses.plain: To terrify and do wrong will waste riches: thus the house of proud men shall be made desolate.

tokens.t: To terrify and do wrong will waste riches: thus the house of proud men shall be made desolate.

verses.plain: A prayer out of a poor man’s mouth reacheth to the ears of God, and his judgment cometh speedily.

tokens.t: A prayer out of a poor man’s mouth reacheth to the ears of God, and his judgment cometh speedily.

verses.plain: He that hateth to be reproved is in the way of sinners: but he that feareth the Lord will repent from his heart.

tokens.t: He that hateth to be reproved is in the way of sinners: but he that feareth the Lord will repent from his heart.

verses.plain: An eloquent man is known far and near; but a man of understanding knoweth when he slippeth.

tokens.t: An eloquent man is known far and near; but a man of understanding knoweth when he slippeth.

verses.plain: He that buildeth his house with other men’s money is like one that gathereth himself stones for the tomb of his burial.

tokens.t: He that buildeth his house with other men’s money is like one that gathereth himself stones for the tomb of his burial.

verses.plain: The congregation of the wicked is like tow wrapped together: and the end of them is a flame of fire to destroy them.

tokens.t: The congregation of the wicked is like tow wrapped together: and the end of them is a flame of fire to destroy them.

verses.plain: The way of sinners is made plain with stones, but at the end thereof is the pit of hell.

tokens.t: The way of sinners is made plain with stones, but at the end thereof is the pit of hell.

verses.plain: He that keepeth the law of the Lord getteth the understanding thereof: and the perfection of the fear of the Lord is wisdom.

tokens.t: He that keepeth the law of the Lord getteth the understanding thereof: and the perfection of the fear of the Lord is wisdom.

verses.plain: He that is not wise will not be taught: but there is a wisdom which multiplieth bitterness.

tokens.t: He that is not wise will not be taught: but there is a wisdom which multiplieth bitterness.

verses.plain: The knowledge of a wise man shall abound like a flood: and his counsel is like a pure fountain of life.

tokens.t: The knowledge of a wise man shall abound like a flood: and his counsel is like a pure fountain of life.

verses.plain: The inner parts of a fool are like a broken vessel, and he will hold no knowledge as long as he liveth.

tokens.t: The inner parts of a fool are like a broken vessel, and he will hold no knowledge as long as he liveth.

verses.plain: If a skilful man hear a wise word, he will commend it, and add unto it: but as soon as one of no understanding heareth it, it displeaseth him, and he casteth it behind his back.

tokens.t: If a skilful man hear a wise word, he will commend it, and add unto it: but as soon as one of no understanding heareth it, it displeaseth him, and he casteth it behind his back.

verses.plain: The talking of a fool is like a burden in the way: but grace shall be found in the lips of the wise.

tokens.t: The talking of a fool is like a burden in the way: but grace shall be found in the lips of the wise.

verses.plain: They enquire at the mouth of the wise man in the congregation, and they shall ponder his words in their heart.

tokens.t: They enquire at the mouth of the wise man in the congregation, and they shall ponder his words in their heart.

verses.plain: As is a house that is destroyed, so is wisdom to a fool: and the knowledge of the unwise is as talk without sense.

tokens.t: As is a house that is destroyed, so is wisdom to a fool: and the knowledge of the unwise is as talk without sense.

verses.plain: Doctrine unto fools is as fetters on the feet, and like manacles on the right hand.

tokens.t: Doctrine unto fools is as fetters on the feet, and like manacles on the right hand.

verses.plain: A fool lifteth up his voice with laughter; but a wise man doth scarce smile a little.

tokens.t: A fool lifteth up his voice with laughter; but a wise man doth scarce smile a little.

verses.plain: Learning is unto a wise man as an ornament of gold, and like a bracelet upon his right arm.

tokens.t: Learning is unto a wise man as an ornament of gold, and like a bracelet upon his right arm.

verses.plain: A foolish man’s foot is soon in his neighbour’s house: but a man of experience is ashamed of him.

tokens.t: A foolish man’s foot is soon in his
house: but a man of experience is ashamed of him.

verses.plain: A fool will peep in at the door into the house: but he that is well nurtured will stand without.

tokens.t: A fool will peep in at the door into the house: but he that is well nurtured will stand without.

verses.plain: It is the rudeness of a man to hearken at the door: but a wise man will be grieved with the disgrace.

tokens.t: It is the rudeness of a man to hearken at the door: but a wise man will be grieved with the disgrace.

verses.plain: The lips of talkers will be telling such things as pertain not unto them: but the words of such as have understanding are weighed in the balance.

tokens.t: The lips of talkers will be telling such things as pertain not unto them: but the words of such as have understanding are weighed in the balance.

verses.plain: The heart of fools is in their mouth: but the mouth of the wise is in their heart.

tokens.t: The heart of fools is in their mouth: but the mouth of the wise is in their heart.

verses.plain: When the ungodly curseth Satan, he curseth his own soul.

tokens.t: When the ungodly curseth Satan, he curseth his own soul.

verses.plain: A whisperer defileth his own soul, and is hated wheresoever he dwelleth.

tokens.t: A whisperer defileth his own soul, and is hated wheresoever he dwelleth.
